title: 174 Medieval Fantasy Items: 2D RPG Icons
description: This collection features a wide selection of high-quality icons that are ideal for improving game inventory, crafting systems, or in-game stores.
longDescription:
Bring your fantasy RPG to life with the "174 Medieval Fantasy Items: 2D RPG Icons" set! 


This collection features a wide selection of high-quality icons that are ideal for improving game inventory, crafting systems, or in-game stores. 


Designed with attention to detail, these badges cover a wide range of medieval fantasy items, from weapons and shields to clothing, chests and jewelry.


Key Features: 174 Unique 2D icons:


- A large and diverse collection of medieval fantasy items including swords, shields, bottles, rings, books and more, perfect for any RPG or adventure game.

 - High resolution: Most icons have a resolution of 1024x 1024 pixels, with some exceptions - 1024x 1023 and 1031 x 1031 pixels, which ensures image clarity on any platform. 

- File format: All icons are presented in PNG format, which makes it easy to integrate them into any game engine or development software. 


 Universal use in projects: This icon pack is perfect for a wide range of fantasy projects, including:

- RPG and adventure games: Perfect for creating inventory.

 - Fantasy mobile and board games: Add detailed and stylish icons to your user interface, shops, or reward system to keep players interested. 

- Interactive stories or visual novels: Use these icons to display elements of your story, giving a visual touch to key points.


 Easy integration: These icons are designed for quick and easy integration. Just drag and drop them into your game engine or development software and they are ready to use. Their transparent background ensures that they will fit perfectly into any game interface. 


Constant support and updates: This is the first version of the "174 Medieval Fantasy Items" set, but we are striving to update and expand it based on user feedback. As new updates are released, you will receive even more items and variety to use in your projects. 


Feedback is welcome: We will be glad to hear your thoughts! If you enjoyed using this resource, please leave a rating or review. Your feedback helps us improve and provide you with more valuable content. 


Contact us: Do you have any questions or do you need support? Do not hesitate to contact us at e38690614@gmail.com . We are here to help you make your project as good as possible! 


Enhance your fantasy RPG with the "174 Medieval Fantasy Items: 2D RPG Icons" set and take your game to the next level!
